name: Arrows (honorius)
description:
A game in which the player controls a bird with their mouse and tries to dodge arrows. 5 levels of increasing difficulty and an endless mode with rapidly increasing score. The player has abilities such as invincibility and teleport and can catch further powerups in-game.

Coded in Python with Pygame. Credits are here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/10hmXOFVoiq-HSDpivFBLCZT1whVvIEZwqqBNNCvcNtE/...
